member.name: MT_ARBITRARY_HEADER
member.summary: Contains format data for a binary stream in an Advanced Streaming Format (ASF) file.

member.name: MT_ARBITRARY_HEADER.majortype
member.summary: Major media type. This value is the GUID stored in the Major Media Type field of the Type-Specific Data field of the ASF file. It might not match the major type GUID from the Media Foundation media type.

member.name: MT_ARBITRARY_HEADER.bFixedSizeSamples
member.summary: If TRUE, samples have a fixed size in bytes. Otherwise, samples have variable size.

member.name: MT_ARBITRARY_HEADER.bTemporalCompression
member.summary: If TRUE, the data in this stream uses temporal compression. Otherwise, samples are independent of each other.

member.name: MT_ARBITRARY_HEADER.lSampleSize
member.summary: If bFixedSizeSamples is TRUE, this member specifies the sample size in bytes. Otherwise, the value is ignored and should be 0.

member.name: MT_ARBITRARY_HEADER.formattype
member.summary: Format type GUID. This GUID identifies the structure of the additional format data, which is stored in theMF_MT_ARBITRARY_FORMAT attribute of the media type. If no additional format data is present, formattype equals GUID_NULL.
